ComicInfo.Summary: Originally issued as a prequel to the Sunglasses After Dark mini-series, this issue is the first comic book appearance of Sonja Blue and contains story and art not available anywhere else.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 23:27:48. [CVDB238274]
